conversations.body_text: Hi Linimberg Oliveira,  Your pedals and VAM Pro have already been shipped. The HS Pro shifter will be shipped shortly as well. Please allow a little more time and keep an eye on the tracking updates.

Why haven't been shipped yet? Your shipping process takes too long

Yahoo Mail: Search, Organize, Conquer
Hi Linimberg Oliveira,     I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I see your package has been delivered. Have you received it?
